Feature Deluxe Edition:
* Maps for single and joint game "Dead Bank" and "Yacht billionaire"
* Unlock Gear:
- 5 items of equipment: gold and amber glasses, shoes, "Ghost", reinforced boots and gloves "Tactics".
- 5 costumes: elite "Chameleon," a spy costume, the costume mercenary "top tier" and "Eclipse."
- 5 kinds of weapons: sniper rifle VSS, tactical shotgun M1014, 416 assault rifle, a pistol crossbow and F40. * Along with Splinter Cell Blacklist take supplement "Higher Power". It contains additional weapons that will help you to beat opponents. Supplement "Higher Power" contains:
